title: Handle 'No messages returned' Claude CLI error
description: Detect and handle the 'No messages returned' Claude CLI crash. Add specific retry logic for this error type.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Detect 'No messages returned' in claude output/error
Log error to error log file with timestamp
Generate fresh session ID on retry
Max 3 retries for this specific error
If still failing, skip story and continue to next
Send ntfy notification on persistent failure
